title: Can't log into new client! Please help!
body:
So I just recently updated to the new client, but I just can't log into it. When I get to the log in screen there is no where for me to type my password or my Username. If anyone knows  a fix it will be much appreciated!

Edit: SOLVED! Thank you Targon's Blade for the help!

replies.body:
Is it a completely black screen or blue box? If so, you'll want to follow the steps below:

>* First, navigate to the following directory: (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system)
* Right click on **user.cfg** and open it with notepad
* Change **leagueClientOptIn = yes** to **leagueClientOptIn = no**
* Save the changes, then launch League again.

Let me know if this worked!

Its not that its just that the part where you should log in itsnt showing for myself it does show as long as i dont move the client as soon as i move it the login part disapears from my screen.
It also seems for the time beeing you cant play 4:3 resolutions since the game wont get adapt to it and parts of it will not show in screen. Please Fix.

Ah, so because this is caused by the Client's scaling, you can resolve this by holding down **CTRL**, then hitting the **-** button to reduce the size of the client.

Let me know if this helped.
Thank you Targon's Blade! All I needed was the zoom out! Completely helped! Hope to see an Item with that name soon. :) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Same Here, I can't even revert back to the old client {{item:3073}}

You are not the only one. For the time being, hit the button in the lower right saying "Launch Legacy Client" and login via the original client.

{{item:3070}}
